nodes.text: Focused rage was a dark side Force ability that increased durability in battle, as well as overall aggression and potency of one's attacks. It was utilized to great effect by Kylo Ren during the First Order/Resistance War. During the Galactic Civil War, Ren's grandfather, the Sith Lord Darth Vader, also made use of focused rage in battle. Deriving power from their inner conflict and anger, both Vader and Ren could tap into their focused rage to magnify their hate and maximize their fighting prowess, bolstering their aggression and durability.

Focused rage first appeared in the mobile game Star Wars: Force Arena, in which the ability takes the form of a card used during gameplay to boost Kylo Ren's stats. In-game, focused rage appears visually as a red haze surrounding Ren when in use.
